review: Great little device.  Have a Fire TV and Roku 3 on other TV's and this Fire Stick compares favorably with them as far as basic performance is concerned.  It does not have the usb or Ethernet ports like the others.  Nor does it have the number of apps/channels of the Roku 3 or the ear buds and lacks voice recognition on the remote like the Fire TV.  However, it has the same apps/channels as the Fire TV.  It does not load as fast as the Fire TV but about as fast as the Roku other than that it works just as well as the others, out putting great picture quality and good sound.  A great value if one is only going to be watching TV programming.  Would order another and have recommend it to friends.
author: rnldlbl "weber cook"
